bug.author: opencv-pushbot
bug.description:
Transferred from <denchmark-link:http://code.opencv.org/issues/2635>http://code.opencv.org/issues/2635</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>|| Daniel Su√°rez on 2012-12-17 11:19 || Priority: Normal || Affected: branch '2.4' || Category: highgui-video || Tracker: Bug || Difficulty: None || PR: || Platform: None / None </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Posible problem cvQueryFrame</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>May be a problem when execute the method cvQueryFrame in a diferente thread then the main thread under macOs (Snow leopard 10.6.8).
The problem occur when Execute the method that call cvQueryFrame using the Apple method perforSelectorInBackground (that detach a new thread that execute the method passing as argument). The use should be like these:
[obj performSelectorInBackground:@selector(method) withObject:nil]. In the Method will call cvQueryFrame but ill try to debbug and Always get a null frame if execute using performSelectorInBackground to execute my method in a diferent thread </denchmark-code>
